content:
A cockpit of the infantry machine of the invaders of the soldiers of a separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Vladimir Monomakh was destroyed by the PTRC "Stugna".

Video lesions of enemy armored vehiclesPublicatedOperational Command "East".

“Professional, coordinated work, and as a result, another moving target was destroyed - an enemy BMP. While you read this text, our warriors are already giving another enemy technique ... Glory to our defenders! ” - indicated in the message.

Earlier the ArmyinformreportedThree Howitzes and a mortar position of the enemy were destroyed by the fighters of the 112nd Separate Brigade of Territorial Defense forces.
title: "Ripped the roof": the hostile BMP was crushed by the warriors of the princely brigade
description: The video of enemy armored vehicles has released the East Operational Command. ...
author: Army Inform
